creator: shrutiws@yahoo.com
text:
I was trying to install XML-Xindice version 1.0. While following the steps I 
found that directory structure listed in installation steps is different than 
extracted files.

Here is the copy of my extracted dir list
Volume in drive C has no label.
 Volume Serial Number is 283B-0C1F

 Directory of C:\Apache Group\xml-xindice-1.0

12/21/2002  10:59p      <DIR>          .
12/21/2002  10:59p      <DIR>          ..
12/21/2002  10:54p      <DIR>          bin
03/13/2002  11:47p                 822 build.bat
03/15/2002  03:46p              14,280 build.xml
12/21/2002  10:54p      <DIR>          config
12/21/2002  10:54p      <DIR>          docs
12/21/2002  10:54p      <DIR>          icons
12/21/2002  10:54p      <DIR>          idl
12/21/2002  10:55p      <DIR>          java
03/13/2002  11:47p               2,687 LICENSE
12/21/2002  10:55p      <DIR>          logs
03/13/2002  11:47p                 227 README
03/13/2002  11:47p               1,644 start
03/13/2002  11:47p               1,802 startup.bat
03/13/2002  11:47p               1,350 xindice.server
               8 File(s)         22,812 bytes
               9 Dir(s)   3,295,322,112 bytes free


I tried searching the bugs and FAQ database and did not find any messages. 

Thanks
Shruti

Please try out 1.1 or the cvs head and reopen the bug if you have issues with 
that version.
creator: Kevin.Ross@iVerticalLeap.com
